title: A High Loaded Catalyst of Highly Dispersed Nickel Species on Acid-Treated Mesoporous Clay Layers for Efficient CO and CO2 Methanation
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4SE01179A, Paper
Feifei Li, Junbo Zhang, Yufu Liu, Guanjun Gao, Yi He, Xuzhuang Yang
The catalytic performance of a nickel catalyst in the methanation reaction is strongly influenced by the nickel loading in the catalyst. However, a high nickel content in the catalyst can...
